mapper.insert: insert into member (mid, mname, mpassword, mdate, mtel, memail, mage, maddress, moriginalfilename, msavedfilename, mfilecontent) values (#{mid}, #{mname}, #{mpassword}, sysdate, #{mtel}, #{memail}, #{mage}, #{maddress}, #{moriginalfilename}, #{msavedfilename}, #{mfilecontent})

update.if: update member set mdate=sysdate, mtel=#{mtel}, maddress=#{maddress}, mage=#{mage}, moriginalfilename=#{moriginalfilename}, msavedfilename=#{msavedfilename}, mfilecontent=#{mfilecontent} where mid=#{mid}
update member set mdate=sysdate, mtel=#{mtel}, maddress=#{maddress}, mage=#{mage} where mid=#{mid}
